replies.body: It's really important to play consistently without leaving, otherwise you can be marked with lower priority queues by the [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) system.  If you're having any issues staying connected, let me know what exactly is happening.  I'm happy to help!
